mapper.insert: insert into weather1 (weather_description, temperature, humidity, wind_direction, wind_power, city, date_y, wind) values (#{weatherDescription},#{temperature},#{humidity},#{windDirection},#{windPower} ,#{city},#{dateY},#{wind})
insert into weather2 (bj_time, temperature, humidity, info, wid, direct, power, aqi) values (#{bjTime},#{temperature},#{humidity},#{info},#{wid},#{direct},#{power},#{aqi});
